meanings.definition: Relating to the study or description of mountains.
meanings.sent1: The orographical map displayed the different mountain ranges.
meanings.sent2: The hiker marveled at the orographical features of the towering peaks.
meanings.sent3: The orographical research team had a mountain of data to analyze.
meanings.sent4: Her orographical knowledge reached new heights after the expedition.
meanings.sent5: The orographical details painted a vivid picture of the rugged terrain.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the physical features of mountains.
meanings.sent1: The orographical landscape was breathtakingly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The orographical formations stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent3: The orographical patterns in the rocks fascinated the geologists.
meanings.sent4: His orographical photographs captured the essence of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The orographical characteristics of the region were truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The orographical survey team mapped out the mountainous region.
meanings.sent2: The orographical expedition faced many challenges along the way.
meanings.sent3: The orographical study required specialized equipment for accurate measurements.
meanings.sent4: Her orographical expertise was crucial in navigating the rugged terrain.
meanings.sent5: The orographical analysis provided valuable insights into the mountain ecology.
